display_long_description:
"Sigure" is a MR piano game that lets you enjoy playing on an actual piano.  

Even beginners who can't read sheet music can intuitively play the piano.  

For those with piano experience, the game also offers the option to display sheet music for a more traditional playing experience.  

In addition to classical pieces, the game features a wide selection of popular J-POP and anime songs. Enjoy performing your favorite tracks while aiming for a high score!  

---

▼Song List
https://vrpiano.co.jp/sigure/music/

When you install the app, it includes 50 tracks as part of the initial song collection.  

You can also purchase additional tracks one by one, with over 150 songs currently available for purchase. More songs are added every month!  

---

▼Practice Mode

If you're struggling with a piece, the "Practice Mode" lets you rehearse at your own pace.  

Features include:  
- Speed adjustment  
- Section looping  
- Practice with one hand at a time  

---

▼Improvement Program

To help even complete beginners enjoy the piano, we’ve created a step-by-step improvement program called "Step-Up 30."  

The program was developed under the supervision of an experienced piano instructor who specializes in teaching adult beginners, allowing even those who are touching the piano for the first time to learn the basics of finger movements.

---

▼What You'll Need
https://vrpiano.co.jp/sigure/prepare/

- Meta Quest 3 / 3s
- Digital Piano (88 keys with a USB port) 
- MIDI Cable
